author: James Joyce
text: Dear Larbaud: Thanks for the transmitted invitation. I regret I am not free. May I ask you, by the way, to be rather reticent about my new book? Lucia has done an ‘articolessa’ on Charlie Chaplain [sic] which she will send you tomorrow. It is about the same length as himself. Did you get the ‘Coscienza di Zeno’? Kind regards Sincerely yours James Joyce What is the date?
